casebody.data:
ELI GLOBAL, LLC, et al.
v.
James A. HEAVNER No. 12PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Kendal B. Reed, Attorney at Law, for Eli Global, LLC, et al. James H. Hughes, Attorney at Law, Richard M. Hutson, II, Attorney at Law, Durham, Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney at Law, Hampton Y. Dellinger, Attorney at Law, for Heavner, James A.

ORDER

Upon consideration the motion to dismiss the appeal is allowed. It is further ordered that the decision of the Court of Appeals is vacated.

By Order of the Court in Conference, this 1 st day of March , 2018.

Jackson, J., recused
